reason: Second-pass plan refinement complete. 26 concrete steps across 7 phases with full implementation detail from Researcher findings. Key architectural change: transparent session detection via _session_id meta-field eliminates tool schema changes (removed 7 file modifications). Ready for Executor implementation.

next_steps: Executor implements Phase 1 steps 0-2 (types, registry, wiring)
Then Phase 2 steps 3-5 (spawn session_id, ToolProvider detection, server audit)
Then Phase 3 steps 6-8 (interceptor, wiring, hub propagation)
Build verification after Phase 3 to validate core system works
data.plan_changes: Rewrote all 34 steps into 26 concrete steps across 7 phases. Eliminated 8 steps by: (1) removing tool handler/schema modifications (transparent _session_id approach), (2) consolidating small steps, (3) merging Phases 3-5 into one interception phase. Every step now has exact function signatures, file paths, patterns, and acceptance criteria. No RESEARCH NEEDED markers remain.
